description: Manual trading override system - takes priority over document parsing
instructions: Set 'enabled' to true to use these trades instead of parsing documents. Each trade must specify action, ticker, and either shares or target_value.

trades.reason: Take partial profits after 52.93% gain, reduce concentration from 13.7% to ~8.5% weight while maintaining upside exposure to potential future catalysts
Bond yields rising despite Fed cuts, 10-year Treasury at 4.49%, exit defensive position that's underperforming
International equities showing minimal gain (+0.28%), rotate capital to higher conviction domestic opportunities
Down 9.38% in portfolio despite sector strength, NVDA maintaining dominance in AI accelerators, better opportunities elsewhere

usage_notes: Set 'enabled': false to disable manual override and use document parsing
Set 'enabled': true to execute only the trades listed above
Each trade needs either 'shares' (number) or 'target_value' (dollar amount)
Priority affects execution order: HIGH → MEDIUM → LOW
SELL orders execute first to generate cash for BUY orders
HOLD orders are informational only and don't trigger trades
